long_description: The DAKINE Nova Wrist Guard gloves combine trademark quality, comfort and warmth with internal supports to help protect your hands and wrists so you can nail those jumps and tricks with confidence. Lightweight, removable supports help prevent wrist torque without putting potentially harmful pressure on the forearms. Waterproof and windproof inserts and a Durable Water Repellent finish help keep your hands dry; cozy fleece linings and synthetic insulation help keep hands warm. Wrist cinches and gauntlet cuffs with one-hand-adjustable drawcords hold in warmth and seal out the elements. Precurved fingers and grippy Rubbertec palms make it easy to grab ski poles and take off goggles.
